name: Undead Malice
flavor: At the start of any level 7 or higher undead's turn, you can spend Malice to activate one of the following features.

effects.effect: The undead activates a Malice feature available to undead of level 6 or lower.
Until the end of the round, whenever an undead is reduced to 0 Stamina, they deal 8 corruption damage to each enemy within 3 squares of them.
